title: The Belgic Confession: A Commentary (Volume 1)
author: David J. Engelsma
description: Comprehensive commentary covering Articles 1-21 of the Belgic Confession. First volume of a two-volume set providing detailed exposition.
target_audience: Pastors, seminary students, serious Bible students

title: The Belgic Confession: A Commentary (Volume 2)
author: David J. Engelsma
description: Second volume covering Articles 22-37, includes comprehensive indexes for both volumes. Complete exposition of the Belgic Confession.
target_audience: Pastors, seminary students, serious Bible students

title: With Heart and Mouth: An Exposition of the Belgic Confession
author: Daniel R. Hyde
description: Accessible and thorough exposition of the Belgic Confession. One of the best modern commentaries, praised as biblical, historical, and erudite.

title: The Belgic Confession: Its History and Sources
author: Nicolaas H. Gootjes
description: First comprehensive study on the history and background of the Belgic Confession in English. Explores relationship to John Calvin and Theodore Beza.

title: Confessing the Faith Today: A Fresh Look at the Belgic Confession
author: Allan J. Janssen
description: One of few commentaries published in the past century. Explains the text in original context and shows how it can still be confessed today.
target_audience: Contemporary Christians, RCA members, study groups

title: Faith of Our Fathers: Studies in the Belgic Confession
author: Revs. Bradd L. Nymeyer and Al Bezuyen
publisher: First United Reformed Church Chino CA
description: Twenty-five lessons for Middle School (Grades 7 and 8). Workbook format with study questions.

title: The Church's Witness to the World
author: P.Y. De Jong
description: Classic commentary on the Belgic Confession, first published in 1961. One of the foundational English commentaries.
target_audience: Pastors, serious students, Reformed church members

title: Believing and Confessing: 365 Meditations on the Belgic Confession
author: Jason Kortering, Arie Denhartog, Martyn McGeown
description: 365 daily meditations guiding readers toward better understanding of scriptural truths in the Belgic Confession. Daily devotional format.

title: The Three Forms of Unity: Belgic Confession, Heidelberg Catechism & Canons of Dort
author: Joel R. Beeke (Editor)
description: Includes all Three Forms of Unity plus Apostles' Creed, Nicene Creed, and Athanasian Creed. Scripture index included.
target_audience: Reformed church members, students, new believers

title: Reformed Confessions of the 16th and 17th Centuries in English Translation, Volume 2: 1552-1566
author: James T. Dennison Jr.
description: Includes Belgic Confession (1561) among 35 Reformed confessional documents. Many texts in Anglo-Saxon vernacular for first time.

title: Reformed Confessions of the 16th and 17th Centuries, Volume 1: 1523-1552
author: James T. Dennison Jr.
description: First volume of 4-volume set compiling 127 Reformed confessions from 1523-1693.

title: Reformed Confessions of the 16th and 17th Centuries, Volume 3: 1567-1599
author: James T. Dennison Jr.
description: Third volume covering Reformed confessions from 1567-1599.

title: Reformed Confessions of the 16th and 17th Centuries, Volume 4: 1600-1693
author: James T. Dennison Jr.
description: Final volume covering Reformed confessions from 1600-1693.

title: Faithfulness Under Fire: The Story of Guido de Bres
author: William Boekestein
description: Children's book telling the story of Guido de Bres from birth in 1522 through authorship of Belgic Confession to martyrdom in 1567.

title: The Quest for Comfort: The Story of the Heidelberg Catechism
author: William Boekestein
description: Incorporates historical facts including writing of Belgic Confession. Introduces Heidelberg Catechism structure to children.

title: The Glory of Grace: The Story of the Canons of Dort
author: William Boekestein
description: Third book in Three Forms of Unity series for children. Background on Synod of Dort and Canons.

title: Simply, Faith!: Expository Sermons on the Belgic Confession
author: Carl A. Schouls
description: Fresh exposition helping believers know and express their faith. Homiletical treatment emphasizing mind and heart.

title: Creeds, Confessions, and Catechisms: A Reader's Edition
author: Chad Van Dixhoorn (Editor)
description: Gathers 13 Christian creeds and confessions including Belgic Confession with introductions explaining origins and significance.

title: Reformed Confessions Harmonized
author: Joel R. Beeke and Sinclair B. Ferguson (Editors)
description: Seven Reformed confessions in parallel columns including Belgic Confession, Heidelberg Catechism, Canons of Dort, and Westminster Standards.

title: Article 36 of the Belgic Confession Vindicated against Dr. Abraham Kuyper
author: Philippus Jacobus Hoedemaker
description: Critique of Kuyper's series on Church and State in Common Grace. Defends original Article 36 on civil magistrate.

title: Everything in Christ: The Christian Faith Outlined According to the Belgic Confession
author: Clarence Stam
description: Thirty outlines on Belgic Confession with biblical foundation. Originally for pre-confession students.

title: The Church Says Amen: An Exposition of the Belgic Confession
author: J. van Bruggen
description: Fills gap in English commentaries on the most neglected of Three Forms of Unity. Highly recommended newer commentary.
price_info: Check Amazon UK or Reformed Book Services

title: The Overflowing Riches of My God: Revisiting the Belgic Confession
author: Clarence Bouwman
description: Thorough explanation of the Belgic Confession. Provides comprehensive overview of this Reformed confession.

title: For the Cause of the Son of God: The Missionary Significance of the Belgic Confession
author: Wesley Lloyd Bredenhof
description: Explores missionary significance of Belgic Confession. Focus on Guy de Bres' martyrdom and faith.

title: The Three Forms of Unity (Multiple Editions)
author: Various Publishers
description: Various editions containing Heidelberg Catechism, Belgic Confession, and Canons of Dort from different publishers.

title: First Christian Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Sermon Series
author: Various Pastors
description: Study of the Belgic Confession from December 2021 - January 2022

title: Bethel Free Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Series
author: Pastor Eric Moerdyk
description: Comprehensive 45-sermon series on Belgic Confession

title: Covenant Of Grace Protestant Reformed Church Series
author: Elijah Roberts
description: 38-sermon audiobook series on Belgic Confession

title: Grace Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Series
author: Various Pastors
description: 32 sermons spanning November 2019 - December 2024

title: Christ Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Series
author: Various Pastors
description: 38 sermons from September 2013 - September 2014

title: Dr. Kim Riddlebarger's Belgic Confession Commentary
author: Dr. Kim Riddlebarger
description: Comprehensive sermons on articles 9-37 preached in 2003-2004. Also available as written commentary on Riddleblog.

title: Westside Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Series
author: Various Pastors
description: Sermon series from 2021 on Belgic Confession

title: Covenant United Reformed Church - Belgic Confession Sermons
author: Various Pastors
description: Sermon archives covering Belgic Confession articles on baptism, sacraments, civil government

title: CPRC Belgic Confession Classes (CD/DVD Box Sets)
author: Covenant Protestant Reformed Church
description: Extensive class series on CD & DVD covering all aspects: God and Scripture, Holy Trinity, Devil and Demons, Church Offices, Sacraments, Baptism, etc.

title: Guilt Grace Gratitude Podcast - Belgic Confession Series
author: Various hosts featuring Daniel R. Hyde
description: Comprehensive series covering articles including Article 1 (The Only God), Article 5 (Authority of Scripture), Article 26 (Intercession of Christ)

title: Bibletheory Podcast - Belgic Confession
author: Bibletheory Podcast featuring Dr. R.C. Sproul Jr.
description: Episodes on Belgic Confession including Article 28 on church membership

title: Todd Kuperus's Belgic Confession Audio Recording
author: Todd Kuperus
description: Audio recording using the translation published by CRC Publications in 1988

title: The Blessed Hope Podcast with Dr. Kim Riddlebarger
author: Dr. Kim Riddlebarger
description: Podcast series by Dr. Riddlebarger covering Reformed theology including Belgic Confession content

title: Heidelberg Reformation Association - Complete Audio Version
author: Heidelberg Reformation Association
description: Complete audio version of Belgic Confession suitable for learning and memory refreshing

title: Puritan Publications - The Belgic Confession MP3 Series
author: Puritan Publications
format: MP3 for computer, iPod, iPad, mobile devices
description: High quality MP3 audio format version of Belgic Confession

title: Christian Creeds & Confessions App
author: App Developer
description: Searchable library including Three Forms of Unity. Scripture references hyperlinked. Full-text search capability.

title: ReformedApp
author: App Developer
description: Read historic confessions including Belgic Confession, Westminster Confession, 1689 London Baptist Confession, Canons of Dort

title: Belgic Confession - Google Play Books
author: Various
description: eBook version with offline reading, highlighting, bookmarking capabilities

title: Monergism - Belgic Confession Free eBook
author: Guy de Brès
description: Free download in multiple formats. Part of 1,300+ free eBook library.

title: CRCNA Belgic Confession PDF (2011 Version)
author: Christian Reformed Church in North America
description: English version approved by Synod 2011. Official denominational text.

title: CRCNA Belgic Confession PDF (1985 Version)
author: Christian Reformed Church in North America
description: Earlier version approved by Synod 1985

title: URC Learning - Belgic Confession PDF
author: United Reformed Churches
description: Direct PDF download of Belgic Confession text

title: URCNA Three Forms Website - Belgic Confession
author: United Reformed Churches in North America
description: Online text version with navigation and introduction

title: CRC Network - Belgic Confession Study PDFs and Worksheets
author: Christian Reformed Church Network
description: PDF files and worksheets designed for small group study. Great beginner class to Reformed theology.
target_audience: Small groups, study groups, CRC members

title: PRTS Belgic Confession with Introduction PDF
author: Puritan Reformed Theological Seminary
description: Full text with introductory material from seminary

title: A Comparison of Guy de Brès' Le baston de la foy chrestienne and the Belgic Confession
author: In-Sub Ahn
publisher: Brill - Church History and Religious Culture
description: 2024 scholarly article comparing de Brès' earlier work with Belgic Confession on Church and State

title: John Calvin and the Belgic Confession
author: S.A. Strauss
description: Academic paper exploring relationship between Calvin and Belgic Confession

title: Westminster Theological Seminary - Belgic Confession Resource Page
author: Westminster Theological Seminary
description: Resource page discussing history of Belgic Confession and Guido de Brès

title: Westminster Seminary California - Belgic Confession Page
author: Westminster Seminary California
description: Comprehensive page with full text of Belgic Confession

title: The Belgic Confession by Cornelis Venema
author: Dr. Cornelis P. Venema
description: Article from Tabletalk magazine providing comprehensive overview. Also available as audio.

title: Mid-America Journal of Theology - Belgic Confession Articles
author: Various scholars
description: Scholarly articles including reviews of Gootjes' work and studies on Three Forms of Unity

title: Canadian Reformed Seminary - Library Resources on Belgic Confession
author: Canadian Reformed Theological Seminary Library

title: PRTS Transform - Three Forms of Unity II: Belgic Confession Course
author: Puritan Reformed Theological Seminary
description: Explores historical development, content, and impact of Belgic Confession. Includes Guido de Bres biography and historical circumstances.

title: URC Learning - Belgic Confession Online Course
author: United Reformed Churches
description: Introduction to Christian worldview and Reformed teachings. Available through various platforms including iTunes.

title: Mid-America Reformed Seminary MARSCast - Three Forms of Unity: The Belgic Confession
author: Mid-America Reformed Seminary Faculty
description: Podcast discussing Three Forms of Unity with focus on Belgic Confession

title: Life in Christ Catechism Curriculum
author: Various authors
description: Covers Three Forms of Unity with reference to Westminster Standards. Workbook Q&A format with 25 lessons per volume.

title: Covenantal Catechism Series
author: Canon Press
description: Teaches from perspective of Reformation confessions including Belgic Confession. Book 1 for ages 5-6.

title: Christian Study Library - Belgic Confession Lesson PDFs
author: Klaas Stam and others
description: Downloadable PDF lessons with study questions on Belgic Confession articles

title: The Heidelblog - Resources on the Belgic Confession (1561)

description: Comprehensive resource page with links to commentaries, audio, and articles. Includes Heidelcast versions.

title: The Gospel Coalition - Belgic Confession of Faith (1561)

title: Standard Bearer Magazine - Extensive Article Series

title: Logos Bible Software - The Belgic Confession: Its History and Sources

author: Vallensis, Lepusculus
